bill_title: to establish certain provisions regarding the requirement to register a large boat.
keywords: Motor Vehicle Registration, License Plates & Fees

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain provisions regarding the requirement to register a large boat. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 42-8 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The purchaser of a new or used large boat shall apply for registration required by § 42-8-5 within thirty days after date of its purchase. During the thirty-day period, the owner shall keep the bill of sale or copy on or in the boat, and shall provide it to any law enforcement officer for inspection upon request. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
